nodes.text: Unidentified DRK-1 Dark Eye probe droid
A DRK-1 Dark Eye probe droid, also known as Sith probe droid, was a repulsorlift probe droid employed by the Sith prior to the Clone Wars.

Darth Maul carried three DRK-1 probe droids aboard the Scimitar during his time as the apprentice of Darth Sidious. Maul recreated these spherical robots using the most disparate, off-the-shelf pieces. He also used his probots to track down Qui-Gon Jinn on Tatooine, where the Jedi struck down one of the spying probes. This droid was the lucky one, which found the Jedi on Mos Epsa and informed Maul about his location.
